sentences.sContent: I make sure they work well.
sentences.sCn: 我要确认他们做得很好。

sentences.sContent: And you have to make sure, what I always say.
sentences.sContent_eng: And you have to make sure, what I always say.
sentences.sCn: 所以我经常说，你要确保良好的工作环境。

sentences.sContent: Then, make sure that you and your spouse share these goals with each other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then, make sure that you and your spouse share these goals with each other.
sentences.sCn: 尽可能具体地说，就是确保你和你的配偶彼此共享这些目标。
